tasks.title: Set Up Backend Server
tasks.description: Initialize a Node.js/Express backend server with TypeScript.

tasks.title: Set Up Frontend Project
tasks.description: Initialize a React/Vite frontend with TypeScript.

tasks.title: Establish Real-time Communication
tasks.description: Set up Socket.IO for real-time updates between frontend and backend.

tasks.title: Implement Zod Validation
tasks.description: Integrate Zod for robust data validation on the backend.

tasks.title: Implement Client-Side Routing
tasks.description: Set up react-router-dom for navigation between different views.

tasks.title: Create Redux Store
tasks.description: Set up Redux Toolkit for state management on the frontend.

tasks.title: Design Task Card Component
tasks.description: Create a reusable React component to display task information.

tasks.title: Develop Kanban View
tasks.description: Create a Kanban board view to display tasks by status.

tasks.title: Implement Task Details Modal
tasks.description: Create a modal to show detailed information about a task.

tasks.title: Integrate Headless UI
tasks.description: Use Headless UI for accessible and unstyled modal/dialog components.

tasks.title: Develop Dependency Graph View
tasks.description: Create a view to visualize task dependencies using a graph.

tasks.title: Develop Timeline View
tasks.description: Create a view to display tasks in a chronological timeline.

tasks.title: Build Dashboard & Metrics View
tasks.description: Create a main dashboard with charts and key metrics.

tasks.title: Implement View Switching Logic
tasks.description: Allow users to switch between Kanban, Graph, and Timeline views.

tasks.title: Verify Real-time Updates
tasks.description: Ensure all views update in real-time when task data changes.

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Design
tasks.description: Ensure the dashboard is usable on different screen sizes.

tasks.title: Final Testing & Bug Fixing
tasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing and fix any remaining bugs.
